trans-unit.source: Represents a specialized label that can display its contents on one or two lines, with an optional shape displayed inline with the text.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the amount by which each line of text is offset from the baseline.
This property gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.BaselineOffset%2A> property of the control’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.BaselineOffset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Dependency Property Information The baseline is the invisible horizontal line with which the base of each character in a line of text is aligned.
||| |-|-| |Identifier field|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.BaselineOffsetProperty>| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The amount by which each line of text is offset from the baseline, in device independent pixels.
A value of <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> indicates that an optimal baseline offset is automatically calculated from the current font characteristics.
The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.BaselineOffset*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.HasTwoLines*> attached property for an object.
The object from which the property value is read.
The object’s <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.HasTwoLines*> property value.
The specified element is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.PathData*> attached property for an object.
The object from which the property value is read.
The object’s <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.PathData*> property value.
The specified element is .
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.HasTwoLines*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the height of each line of content.
This property gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.LineHeight%2A> property of the control’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.LineHeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Dependency Property Information Gets or sets the height of the line set on the internal .
||| |-|-| |Identifier field|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.LineHeightProperty>| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The height of each line, in device independent pixels, in the range of 0.0034 to 160000.
A value of <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> indicates that the line height is determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.LineHeight*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the mechanism by which the line box is determined for each line of content.
This property gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.LineStackingStrategy%2A> property of the control’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.LineStackingStrategy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
One of the enumeration values that specifies how the line box is determined for each line of text.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.LineStackingStrategy*> dependency property.
To be added.

Measures the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText"></xref> in preparation of arranging them during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
The maximum size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText"></xref>.
The desired size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText"></xref>.
Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText"></xref> when a new template is applied.
This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTwoLineTextAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Gets or sets the thickness of the space between the boundaries of the content area and the displayed content.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The thickness of the space between the boundaries of the content area and the displayed content.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.Padding*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.PathData*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the inside of the shape that is displayed with the label.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the inside of the shape that is displayed with the label.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.PathFill*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outline of the shape that is displayed with the label.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The brush that is used to draw the outline of the shape that is displayed with the label.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.PathStroke*> dependency property.
To be added.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.HasTwoLines*> attached property for an object.
The object to which the attached property is written.
The value to set.
The specified element is .
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.PathData*> attached property for an object.
The object to which the attached property is written.
The value to set.
The specified element is .
Gets or sets the text content in this element.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
The text content in this element.
The registered default is an <xref:System.String> string.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Gets or sets a value that indicates the horizontal alignment of text content in this element.
This property gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.TextAlignment%2A> property of the control’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.TextAlignment%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
One of the enumeration values that indicates the horizontal alignment of text content in this element.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.TextAlignment"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.TextAlignment*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> that contains the effects to apply to the text content in this element.
This property gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.TextDecorations%2A> property of the control’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.TextDecorations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> that contains the effects to apply to the text content in this element.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.TextDecorations*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the effects to apply to the text content in this element.
This property gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.TextEffects%2A> property of the control’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.TextEffects%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref> containing one or more <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> objects that define effects to apply to the text content in this element.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.TextEffects*> dependency property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.Text*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the text trimming behavior to use when content overflows the content area.
This property gets or sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.TextTrimming%2A> property of the control’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.TextTrimming%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
One of the enumeration values that specifies the text trimming behavior to use when content overflows the content area.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.TextTrimming"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTwoLineText.TextTrimming*> dependency property.
To be added.
